title: Boom!: A tale of twin app developers and their trail of death
description: Twins Ted and Ryan Chelios are freshly out of college and keen to make money. Unfortunately they have no idea what they are doing and, after a helicopter ride business that leads to several violent decapitations and a phone app that causes a number of gruesome deaths, decide they have to go on the lam. Their efforts to escape punishment result in further demented chaos and, ultimately, some difficult realizations about the uneven power balance in their sibling relationship.
author: James C Douglas
